Package chunks

Class Chunk

java.lang.Object
chunks.Chunk
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameVariables
public class Chunk extends Object implements GameVariables
Chunk holds an nxn array of PositionBlocks and stores the x and y position of the entire array. The draw() method draws all position blocks in the array. It handles collision detection of each block within itself, keeps track of its x and y position, and determines if it's a starting or ending chunk. Implements the GameVariables interface.
Since:
March 2, 2024
Author:
Nick Clouse, Andrew Denegar, Molly O'Connor
See Also:
  • GameVariables
  • PositionBlock

  • Constructor Details

    • Chunk

      public Chunk(int xDimension, int yDimension, int xPosition, int yPosition)
      Constructs a new Chunk with given dimensions and coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xDimension - number of rows in chunk.
      yDimension - number of columns in chunk.
      xPosition - the top left x of the chunk relative to all other chunks.
      yPosition - the top left y of the chunk relative to all other chunks.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main Method, used for testing.
      Parameters:
      args - Arguments passed.

    • add

      public void add(int xPosition, int yPosition, PositionBlock block)
      Adds a position block to the chunk with position xPosition and yPosition.
      Parameters:
      xPosition - is the x position that the block appears in the chunk.
      yPosition - is the y position that the block appears in the chunk.
      block - can be any of the PositionBlock types (EmptyBlock, EndBlock, Wall, etc.).

    • checkCollision

      public boolean checkCollision(int[] xCoords, int[] yCoords, Integer[] deltas)
      Checks for any collision between the given coordinates, and all walls in the chunk. Deltas is used to displace the blocks if needed, to see if displacing the blocks by those amounts would result in a collision.
      Parameters:
      xCoords - X coordinates to use.
      yCoords - Y coordinates to use.
      deltas - Displacement of x and y.
      Returns:
      true if a collision is found.

    • containsPoints

      public boolean containsPoints(int[] xCoords, int[] yCoords)
      Checks if the chunk contains the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xCoords - The y coordinates to use.
      yCoords - The x coordinates to use.
      Returns:
      true if the chunk contains those points.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g)
      Draw every PositionBlock in the chunk.
      Parameters:
      g - is the Graphics2D object that will be drawn with.
